WHATS 9 + 10?

oh-no...
It has begun...

21 has two digits. 2*2 equals 3. 2 times 2 is 2 squared. 2 squares put together will make a rectangle. The rectangle will be twice as long as one of the single squares. Two. Twice. Two twice is four. Four minus 2 + 1 equals 1. Four minus one equals 3. Half life 3 confirmed.

But WAIT!

A square is a shape. Four minus one is 3. A shape with 3 sides is a triangle.

Illuminati confirmed.

Butt WEIGHT!

Valve can't count to 3. Therefore, half life 3 is impossible, removing half life from the equasion and replacing it with Valve.

Valve = Illuminati.

Corporate Mundo/ Battlecast Skarner/ Primetime Draven/ Snowmerdinger/ Subterranean Nautilus

TWO LEGENDARIES OUT OF 5. GET HYPE.
3! Primetime Draven is a Legendary skin priced at 975
Bro you dont understand. All draven skins are legendary. Draven is the epitome of legendary. Legendary draven is legendary.

But if all Draven skins are legendary, then wouldn't a Legendary Draven skin be a Legendary legendary skin?

Yes you are reading that right.

Captain's Log: 02/01/15

Day two of my scavenging. Still no luck on the main prize: Nightmare {{champion:31}}. I have one more day of searching to uncover this rare creature. Should I do so, I shall return to my homeland...otherwise, I will need to turn my sights towards other methods of acquiring the beast's whereabouts. Until then...
my friend got pulsefire ezreal i was sooo jealous

I Guess this is rito showing their love in the month of love 
because really how many of us have girl/boyfriends

Had one till she left me for another guy. That's what I get for going to college.
Just decided to purchase $5 RP to try my luck at a mystery gift... got Pulsefire Ezreal. Thanks Riot!

Pulsefire ez, dunkmaster darius and nunu bot for 10 mystery boxes. gg rito

Are you kidding me?!? I am not allowed to use the mystery skin because my available skin pool is less than 10? where the hell is the fine print for that crap RIOT?!

Of course I decide to get a mystery skin....
Armor of the Fifth Age Taric.


woooooo


NOT

Thank you Riot for the ability to self-mystery gift. A friend also gifted me (mystery) 5 times as well, those are the last 5 listed. I think it's interesting to see the complete randomness of the gifts. I love being surprised and I like that we can get both expensive skins and skins no longer available.  This is what I got during the sale:

Blackthorn Morgana
Corporate Mundo
Hazmat Heimerdinger

Captain's Log: 02/02/15

Day three on my search...to no avail. The beast known as Nightmare {{champion:31}} is still very crafty in avoiding my ever watchful eye. I now possess every specimen of {{champion:33}} and {{champion:27}}...and have even captured the elusive creature's Gentleman variant. With the closure of my expedition (from today forward), I will need to find another method to track down this cursed...thing.

Until then...
